title: Expert Course on MOOC Platform Design Utilizing Ontology-Based Automated Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational ICT utilization skills and comprehension of basic educational platform concepts
context.additional_context: Science Sector Manager/Leader Training in BYOD Environments, with Formative Assessment-Centered Learning Outcome Monitoring

learning_goals: Learners can implement semantic connections between learning contents by designing ontology modeling structures for MOOC platforms
Learners can analyze and provide feedback on learner activity data by applying an automated assessment system based on ODALA principles
Learners can improve MOOC learning efficiency by over 20% by constructing a domain ontology based on a science-specific metamodel
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
